1.title: Custom Links
1.subtitle: Introducing KNOT custom links, your gateway to limitless possibilities! With the power of the Knot Custom links, you have the freedom to effortlessly add custom links of any website or any product you want.

2.title: Direct Links
2.subtitle: Direct link allows you to effortlessly redirect your valued customers, friends, and followers to your preferred online destinations, boosting your online presence like never before.With Direct Links, you can now showcase your social media accounts, website, favorite products, or any custom links in an instant. No more waiting for profiles to load or searching for the perfect link to share. Simply share your personalized Direct Link, and your audience will be redirected to the desired destination with a single tap
